title: User Story: Self-Harm
content:
**Option 1 (Seeking Help):**

> Feeling really overwhelmed lately. Old habits are creeping back in. Anyone know some good distraction techniques that actually work? Need to find something to pull me out of this.

reason: The text discusses feeling overwhelmed, old habits creeping back, and mentions self-harm as a coping mechanism. While not explicitly suicidal, it indicates a vulnerability and potential risk for self-harm.
